author: emretufekci
body: PowerShell 6 has not multi tab feature like PowerShell ISE. Currently i'm working more than 10+ docker container on the powershell, while using powershell ise got some problem and also docker does not recommend PowerShell ISE, they're recommend PowerShell itself.

comments.author: mklement0
comments.body:
Are you looking for a _terminal emulator_ (console) with tab support? 
Most of them in the Unix world do support that; on Windows, the upcoming [Windows Terminal](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/windows-terminal-preview/9n0dx20hk701?activetab=pivot:overviewtab) will offer that (currently in preview, but usable), and there are also (stable) third-party alternatives, such as [ConEmu](https://conemu.github.io/).

comments.author: mklement0
comments.body: VS Code is great for _development_, but I think what @emretufekci  is after is the ability to run multiple _terminal sessions_ in a single window with multiple tabs (which you were also able to do from the ISE).

comments.author: sburbano
comments.body:
@emretufekci As @mklement0 mentioned, give a try to Windows Terminal. Officially is "preview" software, but I've been using it already for months without any issues. You can even setup different environments (PS5.1, PS6, different flavors of each one, ...) to suit your needs.
